formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.

formElement.label: Name:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the name for the app to create.

formElement.label: Region:
formElement.documentation: Select the region identifier, the options are: amazon-web-services::us-east-1 or amazon-web-services::eu-west-1.
